alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 4:40PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Collier County through 515 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, or near Golden Gate Estates, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Golden Gate Estates, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Golden Gate, Lely Resort, South Blocks Golde, Picayune Strand State Forest and Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
